channel.title: 一位算士的博客 | a computor's blog: Posts tagged 'postgresql'
channel.description: 一位算士的博客 | a computor's blog: Posts tagged 'postgresql'

item.title: deploying pagila database
item.description:
pagila is a popular postgres tutorial database.

  • make sure superuser postgres existing, or:
# create role postgres superuser password '888';
  • create database pagila:
# create database pagila with owner postgres encoding 'UTF8';
  • create pagila schema:
$ psql -U postgres -f /xi/pagila-schema.sql pagila
  • import data:
$ psql -U postgres -f /xi/pagila-data.sql pagila
